trans-unit.source: Interface definition for creating and deleting Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 virtual roots.
trans-unit.target: 인터페이스 정의 만들고 가상 루트의 인터넷 정보 서비스 (IIS) 6.0 삭제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The IComSoapIISVRoot interface defines methods for creating and deleting virtual roots in IIS 6.0.
trans-unit.target: IComSoapIISVRoot 인터페이스 만들기 및 IIS 6.0에서 가상 루트를 삭제 하기 위한 메서드를 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented only by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> class and is used only within the .NET Framework infrastructure while creating a SOAP-enabled COM+ application virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 이 인터페이스는 에서만 구현 된 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot>클래스 이며 SOAP 가능 COM + 응용 프로그램 가상 루트를 만드는 동안.NET Framework 인프라 내 에서만 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot>

trans-unit.source: IComSoapIISVRoot does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: IComSoapIISVRoot 코드에서 직접 구현할 필요는 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class, which implements the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface that contains the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 대신를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>클래스를 구현 하는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>인터페이스를 포함 하는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>및 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>가 완전히 구현 되지 않은 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: IComSoapIISVRoot is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: IComSoapIISVRoot은.NET Framework에서 내부적으로 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 코드에서 직접 사용할 필요가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 인터넷 정보 서비스 (IIS) 가상 루트를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>인터페이스 코드에서 직접 구현할 필요가 없습니다.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface (implemented by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class), which exposes a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 대신를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>인터페이스 (구현한는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>클래스)를 노출 하는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>

trans-unit.source: The root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 루트 웹 서버입니다.

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root, which corresponds to `PhysicalPath` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: 에 해당 하는 가상 루트의 실제 경로 `PhysicalPath` 에서 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root, which corresponds to `VirtualRoot` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: 이름에 해당 하는 가상 루트의 `VirtualRoot` 에서 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 오류 메시지를 작성할 수 있는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 인터넷 정보 서비스 (IIS) 가상 루트를 삭제합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>인터페이스 코드에서 직접 구현할 필요가 없습니다.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface (implemented by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class), exposes a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 또는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>인터페이스 (구현한는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>클래스)을 노출 한 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>

trans-unit.source: However, that method is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 해당 메서드가 구현 되지 않은 완전 하 게 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: The root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 루트 웹 서버입니다.

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 가상 루트의 실제 경로입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 가상 루트의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 오류 메시지를 작성할 수 있는 문자열입니다.
